story.title: BC-TS-EYECATCHERS:AT — lifestyle (250 words)
story.summary: DEEP CLEANSENew from Tatcha comes a purifying gel cleanser with natural exfoliants to clarify and clean normal to oily skin. The Deep Cleanse is an oil-free cleanser that features silk-derived amino acids, fruit extracts and natural fruit fibers...

xmlText.h2: Eyecatchers: Deep cleanser; lipstick from Pat McGrath
xmlText.p: (NOT INCLUDED IN YOUR TRIBUNE NEWS SERVICE SUBSCRIPTION. To subscribe to Trends and Shopping, see purchase information below.) (PHOTO)

New from Tatcha comes a purifying gel cleanser with natural exfoliants to clarify and clean normal to oily skin. The Deep Cleanse is an oil-free cleanser that features silk-derived amino acids, fruit extracts and natural fruit fibers that work together to give skin a healthy glow. The gel lathers into a foam that lifts dirt from skin without over-drying. It is safe for even the most delicate skin and helps reduce the appearance of pores. Use it with Tatcha’s best-seller The Water Cream. The Deep Cleanse costs $38 and is available online at Sephora and Tatcha.com

Makeup artist Pat McGrath has introduced 11 new shades of her Mattetrance Lipstick. The award-winning, highly pigmented lipstick took over the beauty industry last summer when shades sold out almost immediately. The new shades are inspired by the opulence of three decades of couture shows in McGrath’s archives. The shades range from soft peach (Peep Show) to velvet wine (Full Blooded). FemmeBot, a mid-tone neutral pink, promises to be a favorite. The new colors are available now for $38 at patmcgrath.com and sephora.com
Visit The Atlanta Journal-Constitution (Atlanta, Ga.) at www.ajc.com
Distributed by Tribune Content Agency, LLC.
